title: Merry Christmas Wood Router Sign, Wall, Red and White 15.75 Inches Wide X 8 Inches Tall
features: Dimensions: 15.75 Inches Wide x 8 Inches Tall x 1 Inch Deep. Comes with attached bracket for mounting on the wall.
Beautifully crafted classic wooden sign has been routed to read Merry Christmas. It is made of durable MDF wood.
The festive holiday sign has an overall matte finish with red letters against a white background.
Decorative wood block sitter sign can be displayed on a desk, table or shelf and it can be mounted on a wall.
Suitable for holiday decorating in any style including country, rustic, farmhouse and modern decor.
description: Add some holiday cheer to any room in the house with this classy sign. Traditional craftsmanship may result in slight imperfections of each item. Made in China.
